name: Entanglements.01
description:
[INTERACTIVE]
Tangle the reality with your HAND.
.
ALLOW YOUR CAMERA on your browser and show your hand a few seconds to interact.
..
Control the matrix with your hand which will be detected with your camera. 
...
Move your hand horizontally to change direction of flowfield, vertically to change magnitude of the vectors.
(LEFT OF THE SCREEN FOR CLUSTERİNG)
....
A machine learning model is used for detection.
.....
Made with p5js & mediapipe.
......
Artist: Kerem Altaylar
